name: Here's ur Donut 64
description:
Here's ur Donut 64 is a small and simple 

Donut store sim game created for lowrez jam...

or is it?

-The Game is not yet Finished-

Updated

-Summary-

There's a ton of police in the city, so you decided to build

ur new Donut store besides the Police station!  Serve them 

some of those Donuts, but make sure to be quick or else..

Oh shoot! apparently ur not allowed to build the store there! you have 

a full week to earn $1000 or not be bankrupt, or else The store will be force

to closed (Oh no!)

-Controls-

Mouse, Space to switch between serving and cooking area!!
